title: League not opening
body: Never mind thanks to other riot employees I fixed the problem.

replies.body: Thank you guys for your help I updated my windows to windows 10 and it reinstalled my missing files. Thank you for all your help.

Hi Meekweek,

Are you still running into problems launching LoL? If you are, do you see a pvp.net user kernel error when you attempt to launch?

> [{quoted}](name=Trill Collins,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1KuVMOAY,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-13T22:27:29.816+0000)
>
> Hi Meekweek,
> 
> Are you still running into problems launching LoL? If you are, do you see a pvp.net user kernel error when you attempt to launch?

Not when I attempt it no but resource DLL is not found it says on the screen after I let it load for about three minutes.

Could you try checking your firewall to ensure League is being allowed? Check out this [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for help. Also make sure you scan your computer for viruses and malicious software that could be preventing League from opening. Are there any other programs you have trouble with? Let me know if anything helps.

It can't be either of those I don't have any viruses and my firewall is not preventing me. It just opens for two seconds and then closes and when I tried deleting launcher and patcher in files it just loaded up to two thirds of the bar and stopped. The launcher still is yet to open.

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1KuVMOAY,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-12T02:29:25.377+0000)
>
> Could you try changing the compatibility settings;
> 
> * Right click on the League of Legends launcher > Click Properties, and then Compatibility > Then check ”Disable Display Scaling on high DPI Settings” > Also select “Run as Administrator” > Uncheck Compatibility Mode.
> 
> * You might also try starting it in Compatibility Mode for an older OS

I think I understand what I'm missing I got a bug splat that told me resource DLL not found I there is anything u know about this could u inform me?
If it's the d3dx9_43.dll, you may need to uninstall your version of DirectX and reinstall it through Windows. Check out the Microsoft Support page here; https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/179113
Unfortunately the two options listed did not work if there are any other methods please list thank you.
Is there any other methods I could try?
I'm actually wondering if my lol files are missing anything because my downloads, solutions, and temp files are empty folders. Possibly I'm missing something?

There is no problems with the firewalls and I just did a hard reset on my computer so there are no virus's. The league symbol just pops up for two sec and then disappears. I have tried the delete launcher and patcher in projects thing and it still doesn't work when I reach the 75% mark on the bar that comes up.
